Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.data

Class Data

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.data.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AimCardChoiceData, AimCardInfoData, AimCardRequestData, AimCardResultData, ChangeTurnInfoData, ChangeTurnRequestData, ClientDisconnectedData, CreateRequestData, CreateResultData, DealCardsData, DealCardsResultData, DrawData, EndGameData, FailedCreationData, FailedGameIDData, FailedHostNameData, GameIDChoiceData, GameIDResultData, GameInitResultData, HostNameData, InterruptedGameData, JoinRequestData, JoinResponseData, LastRoundsInfoData, NoActivePartiesData, NotEnoughPlayersData, PingData, PlacingData, PlayersOrderInfoData, PlayersOrderRequestData, PositiveDrawData, PositivePlacingData, PositiveTokenColorData, ReadyToPlayData, RepeatDrawData, RepeatPlacingData, StartingCardChoiceData, StartingCardInfoData, StartingCardRequestData, StartingCardResultData, TokenChoiceData, TokenInfoData, TokenRequestData
public abstract class Data extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the information that will be carried by being sent on the network. This class is also the bridge to the specular MVC mechanism in both Client and Server that is handled by the Messages and the Actions respectively

    • doRMI

      public void doRMI(RemoteInterfaceClient skeleton, RemoteInterfaceServer stub)
      Method which calls the right RMI interface method for each data (with override)
      Parameters:
      skeleton - the client remote interface. Null if data active
      stub - the server remote interface. Null if data passive
